alert.note: Alert for Colfax (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 11 at 11:24PM MDT until June 12 at 12:30AM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albuquerque has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Colfax County in northeastern New Mexico... * Until 1230 AM MDT. * At 1124 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Philmont Scout Ranch, or 15 miles west of Springer, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Springer, Cimarron, Maxwell, Raton Crews Airport, Philmont Scout Ranch, Rayado and Miami. This includes the following highways... Interstate 25 between Mile Markers 412 and 438. Highway 64 between Mile Markers 307 and 337. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
